titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: This resolution elects designated Members of the House of Representatives to the Committee on Agriculture and the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
